DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and the maximum tolerated dose of GRN163L administration in treating patients with refractory or relapsed solid tumor malignancies.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Dose Study of GRN163L Administered to Patients With Refractory or Relapsed Solid Tumor Malignancies
DOC.detailed_description: GRN163L is a telomerase template antagonist with in vitro and in vivo activity in a variety of tumor model systems. Telomerase is an enzyme that is active primarily in tumor cells and is crucial for the indefinite growth of tumor cells. Inhibition of telomerase may result in antineoplastic effects.
